variable.name: sv_minpitch
variable.description: server-side variable for setting minimum of view angles

value.integer: By default, in quakeworld minimum viewangle is '-70'. You can set for example '-90' then you will be able look directly to floor. q3 players should like it.

variable.remarks: EZQuake and ZQuake (may be some other) clients understand this physics change, old clients will be clamped at [-70~80] (quakeworld default) view angles.
